allow_position_change_when_locked.message: Allow position, opacity, scale, rotate change when an overlay is locked or hidden

are_you_sure_want_to_cancel_subscription.message: Are you sure want to cancel your subscription? You will be able to use PRO features until

are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_layer.message: Are you sure you want to delete the layer?

ask_permissions_block1.message: PerfectPixel Add-on tracks anonymized usage information of panel UI with help of Google Analytics and Yandex.Metrika. It helps us to improve the add-on. 3rd party websites usage data isn't tracked.

ask_permissions_block2.message: You can always change your mind on the Settings page which can be accessed with the top right menu.

ask_permissions_block3.message: Do you want to allow us to gather that information?

auto_scale.message: A new layer default Scale depends on display PixelRatio

disable_add_first_layer_helping_screen.message: Disable ‚ÄúAdd your first layer‚Äù helping screen

disable_panel_snapping.message: Disable panel snapping to edge of window

enable_confirmation_message.message:
Enable confirmation messages
A confirmation message will appear when you attempt to delete the layer.

enable_debug_mode.message:
Enable DEBUG mode
For PerfectPixel extension itself debugging

enable_hotkeys.message:
Enable Hotkeys

Hotkeys list:
Alt + S - Show/Hide overlay
Alt + C - Lock/Unlock overlay
Alt + H - Show/Hide whole control panel
= - Increase opacity
- - Decrease opacity
‚Üë - Move overlay up
‚Üì - Move overlay down
‚Üê - Move overlay left
‚Üí - Move overlay right
Shift + ‚Üë, ‚Üì, ‚Üê, ‚Üí - Move overlay with 10x speed

extension_description.message: This extension helps develop your websites with pixel perfect accuracy!

file_scheme_access_not_allowed.message: For using PerfectPixel on local pages you have to check 'Allow access to file' URLs checkbox for PerfectPixel plugin on chrome://extensions page

input_is_not_valid_email.message: The input is not valid e-mail

is_centered.message: A new layer is centered by default

is_inverted.message: A new layer is inverted by default

is_locked.message: A new layer is locked by default

is_visible.message: A new layer is visible by default

layer_change_title_hint.message: Double click to add or change the title

login_failed_ensure_email_and_password_a.message: Login failed. Please ensure email and password are correct

perfectpixel_pro_features_4.message: By purchasing subscription you support maintainers and accelerate new free and pro features development

remember_panel_state.message:
Remember panel state
When enabled panel will be re-opened when you browse to another page or reload current if it was opened before that.

toggle_collapsed_mode.message: Double click to toggle Collapsed mode

you_are_able_to_use_pro_features_until.message: You are able to use PRO features until
